target_audience: students and educators who want a science-grounded study plan

refs.ref_string: Dunlosky et al. (2013) Review of learning techniques
refs.content: Classifies 10 popular techniques by utility; high-utility: practice testing and distributed practice; low-utility: highlighting, rereading.
Practical classroom/student guides translating cognitive psychology into usable strategies (retrieval, spacing, interleaving, dual coding).
Demonstrates testing effect: repeated retrieval produces better long-term retention than repeated study.

special_instructions: Provide a 4-week study plan template using spacing + retrieval; include quick myth-busting callouts for rereading and highlighting.
